title: Ancient Earth Globe
dot:
digraph EarthVisualization{rankdir=TB;node[shape=rect, style=filled, color=lightblue, fontname="Arial", fontsize=12]; title[label="What did Earth look like years ago?", shape=plaintext, style=solid, fontsize=16, fontcolor=black];section1[label="Early Triassic Period
- Lower oxygen levels
- Extinction of many land plants
- Coral reefs took millions of years to re-form
- Survival of small ancestors to birds, mammals, and dinosaurs"]; section2[label="Pangaea Supercontinent", shape=ellipse, style=dashed, color=lightgrey]; section3[label="Visualization Details
- Created by Ian Webster
- Paleogeographic maps by C.R. Scotese
- Accurate to ~100 km
- Color based on elevation and bathymetry"]; section4[label="Navigation & Interaction
- Use ← and → to step through time"]; section5[label="Resources & Credits
- PALEOMAP Project
- Earthbyte and Global Geology
- Methods and details available online"];section6[label="Subscription & Updates
- Subscribe for updates on new data", shape=ellipse, style=dotted, color=lightgrey];title->section1;section1->section2;section1->section3;section3->section4;section3->section5;section3->section6;}

title: Ink: React for interactive command-line apps
You don't need Scrum, you just need to do Kanban right (2022)
dot:
digraph ScrumVsKanban{rankdir=TB;node[shape=box, style=rounded, fontname="Arial", fontsize=12];MainIdea[label="Scrum vs Kanban
Choosing the Right Framework", shape=ellipse, style="bold, filled", color="#87CEFA", fillcolor="#E6F3FF"];Scrum[label="Scrum
(Prescriptive Framework)", color="#FF7F50"];MainIdea->Scrum;Kanban[label="Kanban
(Principles-based Framework)", color="#32CD32"];MainIdea->Kanban;ScrumBenefits[label="Scrum Benefits
(Shared with Kanban)", shape=plaintext, fontname="Arial Bold", fontsize=10];Scrum->ScrumBenefits;ScrumBenefit1[label="Makes teams more responsive", color="#FF7F50"];ScrumBenefit2[label="Makes estimation easier", color="#FF7F50"];ScrumBenefit3[label="Makes work visible", color="#FF7F50"];ScrumBenefit4[label="Reduces waste", color="#FF7F50"];ScrumBenefit5[label="Creates cadenced meetings", color="#FF7F50"];ScrumBenefits->{ScrumBenefit1 ScrumBenefit2 ScrumBenefit3 ScrumBenefit4 ScrumBenefit5};KanbanAmplifications[label="Kanban Amplifications
(How Kanban improves on Scrum)", shape=plaintext, fontname="Arial Bold", fontsize=10];Kanban->KanbanAmplifications;KanbanImprove1[label="Responds to feedback faster
(no sprint waiting)", color="#32CD32"];KanbanImprove2[label="Focuses on rate matching
(no unnecessary estimation)", color="#32CD32"];KanbanImprove3[label="Uses Kanban boards for
work visibility and action", color="#32CD32"];KanbanImprove4[label="Dynamically adapts to reduce waste", color="#32CD32"];KanbanImprove5[label="Flexible meeting cadences
(adapts to need)", color="#32CD32"];KanbanAmplifications->{KanbanImprove1 KanbanImprove2 KanbanImprove3 KanbanImprove4 KanbanImprove5};ScrumDrawbacks[label="Drawbacks of Scrum", shape=plaintext, fontname="Arial Bold", fontsize=10];Scrum->ScrumDrawbacks;ScrumDrawback1[label="Prescriptive
(ignores process nuances)", color="#FF4500"];ScrumDrawback2[label="Slower and less adaptable", color="#FF4500"];ScrumDrawback3[label="Inefficient when customized", color="#FF4500"];ScrumDrawbacks->{ScrumDrawback1 ScrumDrawback2 ScrumDrawback3};KanbanPrinciples[label="Kanban Principles
(Flexible, Dynamic, Efficient)", shape=plaintext, fontname="Arial Bold", fontsize=10];Kanban->KanbanPrinciples;KanbanPrinciple1[label="Pull-based system", color="#32CD32"];KanbanPrinciple2[label="Rate matching", color="#32CD32"];KanbanPrinciple3[label="Limits work in progress", color="#32CD32"];KanbanPrinciple4[label="Focus on outcomes", color="#32CD32"];KanbanPrinciples->{KanbanPrinciple1 KanbanPrinciple2 KanbanPrinciple3 KanbanPrinciple4};ScrumBenefit1->KanbanImprove1[label="Also true for Kanban", style=dashed, color="#4682B4"];ScrumBenefit2->KanbanImprove2[label="Also true for Kanban", style=dashed, color="#4682B4"];ScrumBenefit3->KanbanImprove3[label="Also true for Kanban", style=dashed, color="#4682B4"];ScrumBenefit4->KanbanImprove4[label="Also true for Kanban", style=dashed, color="#4682B4"];ScrumBenefit5->KanbanImprove5[label="Also true for Kanban", style=dashed, color="#4682B4"];}
